title: Matterials Matter!: Nanocatalysts and sustainable production
abstractText:
The importance of catalysis and sustainable production in modern society cannot be underestimated as major technologies.The aim of this project was to develop resources and practical activities on these topics that would be suitable for a lay audience.Targets are information leaflets, and practical workshops to be delivered to large numbers of members of the general public during Science week, and to school groups initially in Southampton.

The project sits within a larger EU Network of Excellence collaboration - IDECAT - funded through the EU FP6 programme. A further target is to share the new resources with European partners in the network to maximise their use, and contribute to increased public appreication of the importance of the scientific research underpinning these technologies.
